    Admin - Class in domain
    Represents an administrator in the library system.
    Admin() - Constructor for class domain.Admin
    Constructs a new Admin with no initialized credentials or status.

    Constructs a new Admin with the specified username and password.
    AdminFileLoader - Class in application
    Loads administrator data from an external file and converts it into Admin objects.

    Constructs an AdminFileLoader for the specified file.
    adminRegister(Admin) - Method in class application.AdminService
    Registers a new administrator in the system.
    AdminRepository - Class in persistence
    Repository class for managing Admin entities in memory.
    AdminRepository() - Constructor for class persistence.AdminRepository

    AdminService() - Constructor for class application.AdminService

    AdminSourceLoader - Interface in application
    Represents a source loader for administrators.
    AdminStatus - Enum in domain
    Represents the operational status of an administrator in the library system.
